posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', 'Studio Bedroom and 1 Bath in Somerville / Davis Square $2,250', 'Somerville / Davis Square / Powderhouse Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#143210', 'Apartment Summary', 'Great studio in a pristine character and charm building.', ' Big rooms, natural woodwork, hardwood floors and high ceilings.', 'Heat and hot water included and coin-op laundry on site.', 'Just down the street from Davis Square and the Red Line.', ' (Reference #143210)', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bedrooms:', 'Studio', 'Bath:', '1', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Reference:', '#143210', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Davis Square', 'Call the office @ 617-684-8000', 'Email : Hit Reply top left', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.684.8000', 'Please mention reference #', '143210', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
